mapper.select:
SELECT t.task_id, t.task_name, t.task_type, t.db_type, t.procedure_name, t.execute_type, t.execute_next, t.execute_period, t.scan_type, date_format( t.scan_next, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS scan_next, t.scan_period, t.scan_execute, t.dependency, t.`group`, t.`status` FROM t_sms_task t WHERE 1 = 1 and t.sys_type = 1
AND ( t.scan_execute = 1 OR t.execute_type = 0 OR CASE t.execute_type WHEN 1 THEN str_to_date( t.execute_next, '%Y%m%d%H%i' ) WHEN 2 THEN str_to_date(t.execute_next, '%Y%m%d%H') WHEN 3 THEN str_to_date(t.execute_next, '%Y%m%d') WHEN 4 THEN str_to_date(t.execute_next, '%Y%m%d') WHEN 5 THEN str_to_date( concat(t.execute_next, '01'), '%Y%m%d' ) WHEN 6 THEN str_to_date( concat(t.execute_next, '01'), '%Y%m%d' ) WHEN 7 THEN str_to_date( concat(t.execute_next, '0101'), '%Y%m%d' ) END <= now() ) AND t.scan_next <= now() AND t.`status` IN (1, 2) ORDER BY t.`group`, t.`order`
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sms_task_log ( task_id, data_date, start_date, remark, STATUS ) VALUES (#{task_id}, #{data_date}, now(), #{remark}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sms_task_log l SET l.end_date = now(), l.duration = TIMEDIFF(now(), l.start_date), l.remark = #{remark}, l.`status` = #{status} WHERE l.log_id = #{log_id}

UPDATE t_sms_task t SET
t.`status` = #{status},
t.execute_next = #{execute_next},
t.scan_next = #{scan_next},
t.update_date = now() WHERE t.task_id = #{task_id}
